name: Jeanne d'Arc, the Awakening Purity
text: Continuous: Each turn, prevent the first damage that would be dealt to a Fantasy or Human J/resonator you control. Awakening : Enter: You may put a nonspell Fantasy Card from your hand into your field. (You may pay an additional as you play this card. If you do, this card gains the following ability.)
set: The Castle of Heaven and the Two Towers
